name: Ice-Quebras (Prototype 1.0)
description:
This is my second master's degree in Design Interaction work I've done. It is a prototype of the game called Ice-Quebras which was though to be played with teams between 2 to 4 people, in the total playing 2 to 16

At the start of the game each player would have to choose a card to be assigned to a team. 

Then, in the context of this prototype, walk around clicking their team's color to draw a new challenge randomly.

This early prototype was made in a way that always draw the same chalenges (Conversations and Memory). the timer doesn't reset properly yet and is still fully in portuguese, which is my main language. I'm considering in translating some of the challenges and update this prototype later.

If you play this game and would like to give some feedback please leave it on the coments or on this survey: https://form.jotform.com/inesborges.info/ice-quebras

All of your feedback will be remained anonimouse and be used for academical purpose and to make the game even more better and awesome ^^

Thank you for your supoort!
